details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.9 XObjects - 6.2.9.2 Reference XObjects
details.description: A conforming file shall not contain any reference XObjects

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain any reference XObjects

error.message: The document contains a reference XObject (Ref key in the form XObject dictionary)
